post.text: "Valiente. Brave. That's what Hillary Clinton called me when I told her I was worried my parents would be deported" â€”Karla Ortiz #DNC

comment.author: Dennis
comment.text: He will never help Latinos. He has a poor view of us. He often said he would deport Latinos specifically. For those you who believe undocumented Latinos do not want to be U.S. Citizen you are so wrong. I believe he also said he would revoked the U.S. Citizenship of the Puerto Kaitlynnicans.

replies.author: Kaitlynn
replies.text: Nice to see you only care for race, how wonderful!!!

replies.author: Ryan
replies.text: Cite the source on the Puerto Kaitlynnico citizenship comment. Then go back and research a little, Illegals is who he wants to deport. Now go back and research the word "illegal". If anyone wants to be a citizen of the US, do it legally. Illegally is a crime.

replies.author: Dennis
replies.text: Ryan it's more than deported illegals, Obama has done that! Trump spreads hatred of Latinos through his speeches. He loves to group us all into a single group calling us rapist, drug dealers, etc. He wants You, the Anglo group, to believe that America is Yours and he is going to make sure you get it back. But guess what America belongs to all of us including this Latina!!!

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: He never grouped you all! Smh
